extension
Class DependencyParser

java.lang.Object
  extension.DependencyParser

public class DependencyParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class gets the value from the Annotation Depends and extracts method names and parameters. with this information it creates a List of Method Objects which represent the dependencies of the current test method.

Author:
Lea Haensenberger (lhaensenberger at students.unibe.ch)

          This methods parses the String annotationValue and extracts method names and the parameters of this method, if there are overloaded methods.

Method Detail

getDependencies

public java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> getDependencies(java.lang.String value)
                                                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                                java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
This methods parses the String annotationValue and extracts method names and the parameters of this method, if there are overloaded methods. With the extracted information it creates Method Objects.

Returns:
a List of Method Objects which are created from the String value.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
java.lang.SecurityException
java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

getDependencies

public java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> getDependencies(java.lang.reflect.Method javaMethod)
                                                         throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
Throws:
java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
